title: Payments & Stripe Integration
description: Stripe checkout sessions and webhook handling

requirements.title: Stripe environment config
requirements.description: Each landing page includes Stripe keys from environment variables
requirements.notes: Env vars: STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY, STRIPE_SECRET_KEY, STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET implemented in stripe_service.go and env file

requirements.title: Stripe routes
requirements.description: Each landing page includes routes for creating checkout sessions and handling webhook events
requirements.notes: Routes: POST /api/checkout/create, POST /api/webhooks/stripe - implemented with handlers and endpoints

requirements.title: Webhook signature verification
requirements.description: All webhook endpoints verify Stripe signature before processing
requirements.notes: HMAC-SHA256 signature verification implemented with proper timing attack protection

requirements.title: Subscription verification endpoint
requirements.description: Each landing page exposes GET /api/subscription/verify accepting user identity, returning active/inactive/trial/canceled
requirements.notes: GET /api/subscription/verify endpoint implemented with user identity lookup (email or customer ID)

requirements.title: Verification caching
requirements.description: Subscription verification responses cacheable (short TTL) with max 60s lag from webhook changes
requirements.notes: Cache metadata (cached_at, cache_age_ms) included in response. Warning logged if cache > 60s old

requirements.title: Subscription cancellation endpoint
requirements.description: API exposes POST /api/subscription/cancel validating user and returning status
requirements.notes: POST /api/subscription/cancel endpoint implemented with user validation and status update
